TopicTitle: What is your highest patch count by moduleManager?

Articles.Content:
I specifically remember someone doing this a while back, with a max 2500ish. Mine personally (several installs ago) was 4900, but since then it's dropped to 0... and I've uninstalled it.

For those curious, these are my mods:

Somewhere along the line, mine always just flips out and stops being legible.

 

-Jn-

12 hours ago, AlextheBodacious said:

For those curious, these are my mods:

Is that the right image?

I also remember mine being about 2500, but there were multiple versions of MM installed so they overlapped in the loading screen. So technically 7500ish?

3 hours ago, KerbonautInTraining said:

Is that the right image?

It's my gamedata folder...

Just now, AlextheBodacious said:

It's my gamedata folder...

How on Kerbin could a single mod patch so many things

Just now, KerbonautInTraining said:

How on Kerbin could a single mod patch so many things

I did say it was a long time ago... I've since then deleted my mods and WHEW is load time quick!

Also, lag almost disappears! I don't have mods I don't need, and fairings kept just slamming into the bottom stages of my rocket.

My highest count is 472

I had Kerbal Galaxy 2 and all of my near future mods were outdated.

ModuleManager was also outdated

On 23/02/2016 at 0:36 AM, ezequielandrush said:

Mine is 34644...

88 addons installed

And here i was all concerned over 6256 patches

1 hour ago, Qwarkk said:

And here i was all concerned over 6256 patches

FYI, I run KSP in 64 bit mode on a 16 Gb RAM i5...

 

I have installed 89 mods.

Zeke
About 30,000, I'll check my RO and 64k installs SoonTM.

Zero. Never used it.

However, I have seen "How Many Module Manager Patches Have You Installed" threads before. I recommend checking for existing threads before making redundant new ones.

Highest in the past was bit under 40.000. Actual with around 130 mods it vary between 13 and 17.000.

I am on Linux 64 bit with 32GB RAM+4790K, and it nags between 8 and 22 Gig of RAM.

 

EDIT: after tonight updates = 16150@192 mods

Edited February 24, 2016 by Jansn67

7836 patches applied. Running 64 bit modded versions of KJR, FAR, IR, Mechjep, pretty much every space plane parts pack out there. NearFuture, KSPI, DBA, B9, Kerbodyne, KASA, the entire USI release. A few miscalanous things, lots of control/script plugins, some parts I made myself, and a bunch of space station and science expansions.

i've since removed far and the station parts due to performance and texture issues. (my cpu overheating and ram maxing out mostly)

Edited February 26, 2016 by Rushligh
misplaced 0
